text: Glyphipterix ditiorana is a moth in the family Glyphipterigidae first described by Francis Walker in 1863. It is known from Japan, China, Thailand, India, Sri Lanka, Borneo, Java, Malaysia, Mauritius and South Africa. ==References== Category:Glyphipterigidae Category:Moths of Asia Category:Moths of Africa Category:Moths described in 1863
title: Glyphipterix ditiorana
